DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Pitted Erythrocyte Count Outcome Percentage 1 Decimal Place Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The 1 decimal place numeric laboratory percentage value measured, assigned or computed related to the pitted erythrocyte count measured by a laboratory test.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Pitted Erythrocyte Count Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._The number of pitted erythrocytes in a blood sample, expressed as a percentage. It is used as an indicator of splenic function._The result of an action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: The number of pitted erythrocytes in a blood sample, expressed as a percentage. It is used as an indicator of splenic function.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: The number of pitted erythrocytes in a blood sample, expressed as a percentage. It is used as an indicator of splenic function.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1_An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.[manually curated].

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A number with no fractional part.::1:An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
An indication of the specific number of digits to be expected to the right of the decimal point in a line of numbers.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
